short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Right Click on the highlighted text to save any text you want!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Save any website's hightlighted words! 

If you're an avid reader, you will love this extension to help you organize all the fun quotes you read during your time on the internet! 

Features:
Right Click on the highlighted text to save! 
Clicking the quotes to return to the source! 
Include a copy to clipboard function and delete button! 

We hope you enjoy the extension and if you have any feedbacks, please let us know!
Feedback Survey: https://forms.gle/rm3bsGbGr2ZjUxqx6

Created by: HAHA Inc.
